noun.description: Protein derived from soybeans, used as a replacement for animal protein in foods and fodder.
examples: I'm trying to add more soy into my diet
soy is a key ingredient in livestock feed
soy is the nation's leading source of food-grade oil
the most common GMOs are soy, corn, canola, and cotton

origin: Late 17th century: from Japanese soy, shoy, variant of shō-yu, from Chinese shi-yu, from shi salted beans + yu oil.
